role: Member of Interest and Talent Division
organization: Student Executive Board Bekasi Campus Esa Unggul University
description: Created and organized sports events and UEU KHI CUP with the team. Managed student organizations (UKM) on Bekasi Campus.
Involved in mechanical and electrical parts of robots. Competed in Indonesian Robot Contest (KRI). Led user design team for GEMASTIK 2023.
Participated in robotics competitions such as Line Follower. Completed various assigned projects during extracurricular sessions.
